description: The dark gravity-shifting puzzle-platformer with twists. Solve countless MIND CUBES. Embody your MIND by creating your own MIND CUBES and make others suffer...
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or better Processor: i3 or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Anything should work. Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: If no soundcard is available, you can still make ambient sounds with your mouth.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 or better Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: The more the better. Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: There is funky music.... so yeah... sounds are pretty awesome.
